metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez-Miñón Cifuentes, J L
Sarasa Corral, J L
Alférez Villalobos, C
Renedo Pascual, G
López de Alda, A
metadata.dc:description: A case of non-secreting bladder paraganglioma whose clinical manifestation was that of painless hematuria is described herein. Treatment was by partial cystectomy.
metadata.dc:title: Paraganglioma vesical. A propósito de un caso.
[Bladder paraganglioma. Apropos of a case].
